name: Senior Front-End Developer (JS, React, Remote\Relocation friendly)
description:
❗❗❗ВНИМАНИЕ❗❗❗ Уважаемые кандидаты, для данной позиции нужен хороший уровень разговорного английского, нужно будет довольно часто на нем говорить.

We're looking for an experienced Front-End Developer. If your skills match the requirements, please send us your resume today!

Required skills and qualification:

  • Experience in web development on the challenging projects;
  • 5+ years of JavaScript and in-depth knowledge of modern frameworks (React JS preferred);
  • EDUCATION: Degree of computer science / higher mathematics or other natural science preferred, Master or PHD degree is welcomed;
  • English - Upper Intermediate.

Bonus skills:
  • ✓Experience with websockets, SignalR;
  • ✓Web design and UX/UI basics..

Required work experience: 6+ years
Full time, remote work from home (typical working hours 10 am - 8 pm GMT+3)

TradeTheNews.com - financial news analysis company. We offer our service to thousands of clients since 1998. Joining us is a good opportunity to improve your skills of working on challenging projects.

Benefits and additional details:

Paid time off + paid sick leave + paid national holidays.

We're a product company with 20+ years of history on the financial services market. We use time tracking, we don't follow SCRUM, we have a small team of 3 devs and 2 IT engineers and looking for more devs to work on new projects/features. There are some products we offer to our clients and some in-house developed systems we use inside the company, so there are a lot of places to apply your brilliant skills within our company.

Assessment process:
1) First introduction interview;

2) Online tests;

3) Technical interview;

4) Offer.
